content: Activate the Relief of the Fallen Loong Keeper's Shrine and head left to explore the cave. Follow the path to the right in the cave to find the Puppet Tick.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Puppet_Tick_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Puppet Tick Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Puppet Tick Location'.
The content is as follows:
Activate the Relief of the Fallen Loong Keeper's Shrine and head left to explore the cave. Follow the path to the right in the cave to find the Puppet Tick.
